docs.lead_paragraph: As prospects of their own Merry Christmas loomed large, scores of children paused to reflect on their own good fortune and sent messages and gifts for the Neediest yesterday.

headline.main: SCHOOL CHILDREN AID THE NEEDIEST; Classes Send Gifts to Fund to 'Share Holiday Spirit' With Less Fortunate DAY'S TOTAL IS $13,536 In This Season's Appeal So Far 7,381 Contributors Have Given $270,122

docs.snippet: As prospects of their own Merry Christmas loomed large, scores of children paused to reflect on their own good fortune and sent messages and gifts for the Neediest yesterday.
